title: Tech pushes Nikkei higher even as U.S. CPI caution prevails - Reuters
content: Tech pushes Nikkei higher even as U.S. CPI caution prevails  Reuters
description: Japan's Nikkei closed slightly higher on Tuesday, helped by tech stocks as investors snapped up beaten-down equities, even as caution prevailed ahead of U.S. inflation data due out later this week.
